name: Warm Blue
description:
Bring warmth and connection to a massive, cold world.

As a small dumbo octopus, traverse an icy underwater environment using your climbing skills and find pockets of light to keep you warm. Find new friends as you explore, and build up your iceberg home into a cozy sanctuary.

Features:

- Explore a procedural world using gravity-defying movement

- Meet 3 charming characters and hear their stories

- Create a warm community in the freezing ocean
